meanings.definition: A circular symbol depicting a serpent or dragon eating its own tail, representing infinity or cyclicality.
meanings.sent1: The uroboros in ancient art symbolizes never-ending cycles.
meanings.sent2: The uroboros on the pendant gleamed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The playful kitten mistook its tail for a uroboros and tried to catch it.
meanings.sent4: The idea of time as a uroboros, constantly devouring itself, fascinated the philosopher.
meanings.sent5: The uroboros, with its tail disappearing into its mouth, is a powerful image of eternity.
